code: import axios from"axios";export var AWAIT_DATA="AWAIT_DATA";export var DECREMENT="DECREMENT";export var ON_MOUNT="ON_MOUNT";export var onMount=function onMount(posts){return{type:ON_MOUNT,posts:posts};};export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("http://localhost:5000/posts").then(function(response){var posts=response.data;return posts;}).then(function(posts){return dispatch(onMount(posts));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var awaitData=function awaitData(){return{type:AWAIT_DATA};};
